casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Devin M. LASITER. No. 222PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Charlesena E. Walker, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Devin M. Lasiter. G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of May 2006 by Attorney General to Deem Response Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006."
